entities.name: dark arts
entities.description: The Dark Arts is mentioned as an act or a joke by Draco. It's described as something that doesn't require protection.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is the one who thinks the Dark Arts is just a joke and an act. He's being incautious and getting himself caught.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the one who tells Draco that he needs to be careful and not rely on his friends Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of Draco's assistants.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is also mentioned as one of Draco's assistants.

relationships.description: Draco and Snape have a conflict. They disagree on the importance of the Dark Arts.
Crabbe is one of Draco's assistants.
Goyle is also one of Draco's assistants.
